title: Đầu tư và Tài chính bất động sản
overview: Học phần trình bày những vấn khái niệm và đặc trưng bản về đầu tư và tài chính bất động sản để giúp người học nắm được khái quát về các hoạt động đầu tư và nội dung của các hoạt động tài chính trong lĩnh vực đầu tư kinh doanh bất động sản.

skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Recognize and understand basic theories and problem setting in real estate finance and investment.

skill_outcomes.skill_name: Decision Making in Real Estate Investment
skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Apply in recognizing, identifying, evaluating, comparing investment opportunities and making appropriate investment decisions in real estate business.

skill_outcomes.skill_name: Financial Channel Selection and Capital Formation
skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Apply in evaluating and selecting financial channels and forming appropriate sources of capital.
Analyze risks and feasibility in real estate finance and investment activities.
Apply basic spreadsheet tools in financial planning and real estate investment.
Possess the ability to collaborate in group work, responsibility, and professionalism in work.
Possess the ability to work independently, responsibility in group work and personal responsibility.

skill_outcomes.skill_name: Presentation and Defense of Personal Views
skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Possess the ability to present and defend personal views in the field of finance and real estate investment.
Possess social responsibility and professional ethics in the work environment and in social context.

minimum_entry_skills.skill_name: Basic Understanding of Real Estate Market
